Class ShippingCenter

java.lang.Object
ShippingCenter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ShippingCenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class represents the Shipping Center nodes. Its primary responsibility is to get order information from its buffer shared with the Web Server, and then put that line into one of two output buffers (depending on the item category), to be picked up by the Section node. This class implements the Runnable interface, which defines one method, run().
Since:
10/12/2021
Author:
Tucker Dickson

    This private SynchronizedBuffer represents one the output buffers.

    This private int represents the number of the Shipping Center.
    private java.lang.String[] shippingCenterData
    This private array of Strings represents an individual order being processed.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

  • Field Details

    • scNum

      private int scNum
      This private int represents the number of the Shipping Center. This variable is set by the constructor. For this assignment, it will always be either 1 or 2.

    • shippingCenterData

      private java.lang.String[] shippingCenterData
      This private array of Strings represents an individual order being processed. This variable will be used when getting the order from the Web Services shared buffer and when putting the order in the Section shared buffer.

    • inputBuffer

      private final SynchronizedBuffer inputBuffer
      This private SynchronizedBuffer represents a Shipping Center's sole input buffer (shared with Web Services). It will be used to receive orders from Web Services.

    • outputBuffer1

      private final SynchronizedBuffer outputBuffer1
      This private SynchronizedBuffer represents one the output buffers. All orders with categories beginning with A-P will be placed in this buffer, to be received by Section 1.

    • outputBuffer2

      private final SynchronizedBuffer outputBuffer2
      This private SynchronizedBuffer represents one the output buffers. All orders with categories beginning with Q-Z will be placed in this buffer, to be received by Section 2.

  • Constructor Details

    • ShippingCenter

      public ShippingCenter​(int scNum, SynchronizedBuffer inputBuffer, SynchronizedBuffer outputBuffer1, SynchronizedBuffer outputBuffer2)
      This is the sole constructor the the ShippingCenter class. It takes in three parameters: an int and three SynchronizedBuffers. The int is used to initialize scNum, and the three SynchronizedBuffers are used to initialize inputBuffer, outputBuffer1, and outputBuffer2, respectively.
      Parameters:
      scNum - This int will be used to initialize scNum.
      inputBuffer - This SynchronizedBuffer will be used to initialize inputBuffer.
      outputBuffer1 - This SynchronizedBuffer will be used to initialize outputBuffer1.
      outputBuffer2 - This SynchronizedBuffer will be used to initialize outputBuffer2.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      This method is declared in the Runnable interface. It is responsible for getting orders from the Web Server shared buffer, and then passing those order to one of two Sections, depending on the first letter of the item category.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
